mapper.insert:
insert into myty_dengmi_temp
dm_mimian,
dm_mimu,
dm_midi,
dm_mimianzhu,
dm_midizhu,
dm_author,
dm_temp_id,
agenda_round_no,
#{dmMimian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmMimu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmMidi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmMimianzhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmMidizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmTempId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{agendaRoundNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.sql: dm_mimian, dm_mimu, dm_midi, dm_mimianzhu, dm_midizhu, dm_author, dm_temp_id, agenda_round_no
DM_MIMIAN, DM_MIMU, DM_MIDI, DM_MIMIANZHU, DM_MIDIZHU, DM_AUTHOR, DM_TEMP_ID,AGENDA_ROUND_NO
mapper.select: select count(*) from myty_dengmi_temp where dm_author = #{dmAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and agenda_round_no = #{agendaRoundNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(*) from myty_dengmi_temp a left join myty_answer b on a.dm_temp_id = b.dm_id where a.dm_author = #{dmAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.user_id != #{dmAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.agenda_round_no = #{agendaRoundNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update myty_dengmi_temp
dm_mimian = #{dmMimian, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_mimu = #{dmMimu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_midi = #{dmMidi, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_mimianzhu = #{dmMimianzhu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_midizhu = #{dmMidizhu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dm_author = #{dmAuthor, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dm_temp_id = #{dmTempId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select B.user_id,B.user_name, count(A.dm_mimian) as count from myty_dengmi_temp A left join myty_user B on A.dm_author = B.user_id where A.agenda_round_no = #{roundNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by A.dm_author

select dm.dm_temp_id,dm.dm_mimian, dm.dm_mimu, dm.dm_midi, dm.dm_mimianzhu, dm.dm_midizhu, u.user_name, sum(a.user_judge) as user_judge from myty_dengmi_temp dm left join myty_user u on u.user_id = dm.dm_author left join myty_answer a on a.dm_id = dm.dm_temp_id where dm.agenda_round_no = #{agenda_round_no} group by dm.dm_temp_id limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(distinct dm.dm_temp_id) from myty_dengmi_temp dm left join myty_user u on u.user_id = dm.dm_author left join myty_answer a on a.dm_id = dm.dm_temp_id where dm.agenda_round_no = #{agenda_round_no}

select dm.dm_temp_id,dm.dm_mimian, dm.dm_mimu, dm.dm_midi, dm.dm_mimianzhu, dm.dm_midizhu, u.user_name, sum(a.user_judge) as user_judge from myty_dengmi_temp dm left join myty_user u on u.user_id = dm.dm_author left join myty_answer a on a.dm_id = dm.dm_temp_id where dm.agenda_round_no = #{agenda_round_no} group by dm.dm_temp_id order by user_judge desc limit 0, #{pageSize}

select count(distinct dm.dm_temp_id) from myty_dengmi_temp dm left join myty_user u on u.user_id = dm.dm_author left join myty_answer a on a.dm_id = dm.dm_temp_id where dm.agenda_round_no = #{agenda_round_no} order by user_judge desc limit 0, 10

select temp.rownum,temp.dm_mimian, temp.dm_mimu, temp.dm_midi, temp.dm_mimianzhu,temp.dm_midizhu, temp.user_subject_score, temp.right_proportion from ( select (@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS rownum, L.* from ( select dm.agenda_round_no,dm.dm_temp_id, u1.user_name as author, u1.user_id, dm.dm_mimian, dm.dm_mimu, dm.dm_midi, dm.dm_mimianzhu, dm.dm_midizhu, sum(a.user_judge) as user_subject_score, sum(case when a.user_answer = dm.dm_midi OR a.is_right = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as right_user_count, sum(case when a.user_answer is not null then 1 else 0 end) as hand_in_user_count, sum(case when a.user_answer = dm.dm_midi OR a.is_right = 1 then 1 else 0 end)/sum(case when a.user_answer is not null then 1 else 0 end) * 100 as right_proportion from myty_dengmi_temp dm left join myty_user u1 on u1.user_id = dm.dm_author left join myty_answer a on a.dm_id = dm.dm_temp_id group by dm.agenda_round_no,dm.dm_temp_id order by user_subject_score desc) L, (SELECT @rownum := 0) AS rn) temp where temp.user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and temp.agenda_round_no = #{agenda_round_no, jdbcType=INTEGER} limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from ( select (@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS rownum, L.* from ( select dm.agenda_round_no,dm.dm_temp_id, u1.user_name as author, u1.user_id, dm.dm_mimian, dm.dm_mimu, dm.dm_midi, dm.dm_mimianzhu, dm.dm_midizhu, sum(a.user_judge) as user_subject_score, sum(case when a.user_answer = dm.dm_midi OR a.is_right = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as right_user_count, sum(case when a.user_answer is not null then 1 else 0 end) as hand_in_user_count, sum(case when a.user_answer = dm.dm_midi OR a.is_right = 1 then 1 else 0 end)/sum(case when a.user_answer is not null then 1 else 0 end) * 100 as right_proportion from myty_dengmi_temp dm left join myty_user u1 on u1.user_id = dm.dm_author left join myty_answer a on a.dm_id = dm.dm_temp_id group by dm.agenda_round_no,dm.dm_temp_id order by user_subject_score desc) L, (SELECT @rownum := 0) AS rn) temp where temp.user_id = #{user_id} and temp.agenda_round_no = #{agenda_round_no}

select dm.dm_temp_id,dm.dm_mimian,dm.dm_mimianzhu,dm.dm_mimu,dm.dm_midi,u.user_name, dm.dm_midizhu,dm.dm_author,SUM(a.user_judge) as user_judge from myty_dengmi_temp dm left join myty_answer a on a.dm_id = dm.dm_temp_id left join myty_user u on u.user_id = dm.dm_author where dm.dm_temp_id = #{dm_temp_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} group by a.dm_id
